keywords.name: Plasma Beam Overload
keywords.definition: This Formation may choose to overload its Plasma Beam. This formation immediately gains a Vulnerable Marker and increases the Attack Dice of the Plasma Beam by +3 until the end of the Game Turn.

keywords.name: Hunter Assault Cadres
keywords.definition: This Formation begins the game with all its Type-28 Boarding Craft packed with Hunter Assault Cadres for no additional cost.

keywords.name: Cathedral of the Faithful
keywords.definition: Each Section on a CAS can replace ONE of its listed Boarding Craft with a Zealot for No Points. This bonus is in addition to the standard number of Zealots available to the fleet.

keywords.name: Seraph Hosts
keywords.definition: All Seraph Interceptor Wings launched by a CAS increase their maximum size to 6 rather than the normal 5.

keywords.name: Command Centre
keywords.definition: A Fleet Containing a Golden Path Battle Group may re-roll a Single Order Dice at the beginning of either the Attacks or Boarding Segments (but not both).

keywords.name: Hunter Killers
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Torpedoes at Short Range.

keywords.name: Focused Wrath
keywords.definition: All Plasma Cannon Array Attacks made by this Element may re-roll a single Attack Dice for each friendly Zealot on board.

keywords.name: ADP Escorts
keywords.definition: All ADP Escort Formations in a Battle Group can add their Point Defense to that of any Capital Formation in the same Battle Group, but only when the Capital Formation is attacked by weapons with the Missiles Loadout.

keywords.name: Penitents
keywords.definition: SecurityDetails on this Element are considered to have the Assault Specialist (1) Loadout.

keywords.name: Hidden Killer (Blockade Runner)
keywords.definition: Any Ranged Attack made against this Vessel from more than 20 away suffers further -1 to its Firepower Rating.

keywords.name: Hidden Killer
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Torpedoes at Short Range.

keywords.name: Plasma Beam Overload
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Beam Weapons.

keywords.name: Hunter Assault Cadres
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Torpedoes at Short Range.

keywords.name: Fire at Will!
keywords.definition: When executing the Increased Wirepower order, add +4 Attack Dice to the firing solution instead of +2

keywords.name: Strength in Numbers!
keywords.definition: Add 2 to your Faction's Wing Size Limits

keywords.name: Brilliant Strategy!
keywords.definition:
When rolling the Order Dice during the Order Dice Phase, you may reroll 1 Order Dice. The second result must be kept.
        When you spend an Order Dice on an order, roll a regular D6 after resolving the order; on a 5 or 6 do not remove the Order Dice from your Data Sheet.

keywords.name: Take it to Them!
keywords.definition:
You may reroll your D6 when involved in boarding action. As well, you may purchase special boarding craft as follows:
        -Any UNSC Element may have any number of its Pelican Boarding Craft replaced with ODST Strike Teams for a total of +10 points per Team.

keywords.name: Wall of Fire
keywords.definition: This Battle Group may roll 2 Halo dice rather than 1 when resolving the effects of MAC Loadout, prior to the Defense Dice Pool being rolled.

keywords.name: Pack Hunters
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a [skull] when firing MACs - These re-rolled dice may NOT generate any further re-rolls.

keywords.name: Advanced Targeting Solution
keywords.definition: All Attacks made by this Battle Group may re-roll any attempt to cause a Critical Hit.

keywords.name: Carrier Refit
keywords.definition: The Supported Marathon loses its Missile Barrage Loadout but gains the Carrier (1) Loadout. Additionally, the Supported Marathon in the Cyclops SBG has a Hanger Rating of 5, instead of the 2 it would normally have.

keywords.name: Frigate Resupply
keywords.definition: During the Repairs Step of and End Phase, a Punic may allow a Single Paris Element within 10 to remove a Single Damage Marker from its base. Where applicable, this Can restore Titanium Armor.

keywords.name: Automated Repair Systems
keywords.definition: Each time a Vulnerable Marker is applied to a section of the Punic, roll a Halo Dice: on a [1] or [2], the Vulnerable Marker is immediately removed.

keywords.name: Limited Resources
keywords.definition:
All Punics and CAS exist as individual Battle Groups and are not required to follow the standard rules for Battle Group Creation.
Whilst they are not Specialist Battle Groups, they are restricted by the size of Fleet they are attached to. Therefore a single Punic or CAS can be included in a Fleet for every Full 1250 Points being played.

keywords.name: Advanced Targeting
keywords.definition: This Formation may choose to re-roll any INITIAL rolls of a [skull] when performaing an attack with its Heavy MAC Cannon. These dice must be rolled separately. The Attack then moves to the Re-roll Step as normal

keywords.name: ODST Strike Teams
keywords.definition: This Formation begins the game with all its Pelican Boarding Craft embarked with ODST Strike Teams for an additional +5 points each.

keywords.name: Fighter Cover
keywords.definition: Only Interceptors can be selected by MAC Platforms. Bombers are not available.

keywords.name: Vital Defensive Asset
keywords.definition: A Maximum of 2 MAC Platforms per FULL 1000 points are permitted.

keywords.name: *High Value Target
keywords.definition: This vessel is considered to have a Build Rating of One less than listed during the process of Fleet Building, reverting to its stated Build Rating for the purposes of calculating Victory Points only.
